ispc.compilerTarget.description: The target setting of the compiler used for edit time validation of source files (warnings/errors.)

ispc.compilerArchitecture.description: The architecture setting of the compiler used for edit time validation of source files (warnings/errors.)

ispc.compilerCPU.description: The CPU setting of the compiler used for edit time validation of source files (warnings/errors.)

ispc.compilerTargetOS.description: The target-os (Operating System) setting of the compiler used for edit time validation of source files (warnings/errors.)

ispc.compilerPath.description: The fully qualified path to the compiler used for edit time validation of source files (warnings/errors.)

ispc.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems returned by the server.

ispc.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between IDE and the ISPC language server.
